Her husband has a business of providing transportation of construction supplies, such as sand, concrete, cement and soil, from one place to another.  He has been doing this work for many years and generating reasonable income for his family.  Now his trolley is broken due to overloading and uneven roads. He is a poor person and does not have sufficient money to fix the problem. Thus, he is unable to continue his services and his earnings are zero. 
Therefore, Kiran requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan.  Her husband will use this amount to maintain the tractor and trolley so that he can start his services again.  Kiran thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: For the maintenance of a tractor and trolley to provide the services of construction supplies.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline lives in Nyamira, an area known for very tasty bananas. She is a farmer.  She is married and has three children.  She produces and sells milk, eggs, tea, and bananas.  She has been in farming for five years, where it gives her income for taking care of her family.  She loves when it's harvest time for tea picking because farmers are given bonuses according to their tea production.  However, she experiences a challenge of having limited funds for carrying out her farming needs.
Jackline chose Juhudi Kilimo for this because they are a good solution to small scale farmers who want want to grow in the agri-business. This loan will help her bring in more income to her family and help alleviate poverty.

loans.use: to purchase bio-gas

loans.name: Maria Socorro

texts.es: doña Maria de 62 años de edad es una mujer responsable, honesta y trabajadora, siempre se ha esforzado por sacar adelante a su familia con mucho esfuerzo hace 45 años decidió poner un negocio de venta de ropa el cual le ha ayudado para solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo, Doña Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor como: blusas, pantalones, camisas, short, vestidos, etc. para poder surtir con mas variedad de productos su negocio y asi tener una mejor calidadd e vida junto a su esposo.
texts.en: Maria is 62 years old and is a responsible, honest, and hardworking lady who always strives to get her family ahead.  She started a business selling clothing 45 years ago and it helped her pay her household expenses.  She lives in a home of her own with her husband.  Maria is asking for a loan to buy clothing such as blouses, pants, shirts, shorts, dresses, etc. so she can stock up with a variety of products and have a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Jovenes De Belen Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Jóvenes de Belén está dentro del programa de comités de jóvenes, como su nombre lo dice, son jóvenes que quieren emprender un trabajo para poder ayudar con un poco de ingresos a sus familias.
Arcenia comenta que lava ropa ajena, y por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia teniendo un poco de ingresos que les es de mucha ayuda. Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de jabones, suavizante y demás, para poder seguir con su trabajo, creciendo y mejorando cada vez más.
texts.en:
The group "Jóvenes de Belén" (Youngsters of Belen) is in the Youth Entrepreneurship Program, and as the name states, they are young people who want to launch a business in order to make an income to help their families.
Arcenia tells us that she washes clothing as a business and this provides her with an income that allows her to help her family. She is requesting this loan to invest in detergent, fabric softener and other, so she can continue growing and improving her business.

loans.use: buy detergent, fabric softener and other.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Emprendedoras; está en su ciclo número 10 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Hicieron la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde casi todas las integrantes ya lograron mejorar su línea de pobreza, a través de las Capacitaciones del Plan de Negocios y Técnica en Ventas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Luisa quien tiene una despensa que con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo monto. Comenta que al principio le fue un poco complicado, pero que después fue afianzándose y así pudo crecer y hacerse de muy buena clientela.
La Sra. Solicita este crédito para la compra de harina, azúcar, fideo, aceite, leche, bebidas en general; entre otros; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group Mujeres Emprendedoras is in its tenth cycle of the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other get ahead. They completed the poverty elimination survey, and nearly all of the members have already managed to improve their poverty line through the Business Plan and Sales Techniques trainings.

Luisa is one of its members and has a grocery store, which she set up with much effort and sacrifice. She says that in the beginning it was a bit complicated but later on she gradually established herself and that way she was able to grow and acquire a very good customer base. She is requesting this loan to buy flour, sugar, pasta, oil, milk, beverages in general, and other items. This will help her carry out her business plan, which will in turn help her improve her income.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, pasta, oil, milk, beverages, and other items.

loans.name: San Roque Group

texts.es:
San Roque es un grupo formado en la ciudad de Caacupé, tiene 18 integrantes, donde cada una de ellas está esforzándose por luchar y crecer.
La señora Elisa es integrante del comité, es casada y se dedica a la venta de dulces,  el crédito que pide lo quiere invertir en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de dulces, como ser azúcar, leche, frutas y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad de crecer que está recibiendo, que le permitirá ayudar a su familia y mejorar en su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
San Roque is a group formed in the city of Caacupé.  There are 18 members, all of whom are making an effort to strive and grow.  

Elisa is a member of the communal bank.  She is married and she works selling sweets.  She wants to use this loan to buy ingredients for making candy, such as sugar, milk, fruit, etc.  She is thankful for the opportunity for growth that she is receiving, which will allow her to help her family and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making sweets, such as sugar, milk, fruit, etc.

loans.name: San Luis Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Maria es una de las integrantes, quien vende frutas como un medio de poder ayudar a su familia, comenta que le está yendo cada vez mejor, ya que a sus clientes les gusta mucho las frutas que vende.
Pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de naranjas, peras, manzanas, y demás productos para la venta. Agradece por la oportunidad que todos están recibiendo.
texts.en:
This group is from the city of Concepción, a region that despite being located a bit far from the center of the country, continues to grow. It is a remote region and this is why this group’s members want to fight in order to grow and help their region to have a better environment and to support its growth.

Maria is one of the members. She sells fruits in order to contribute to the maintenance of the family. She says that she does better every day and that her customers like the fruits she sells.

She is requesting a loan to buy oranges, pears, apples and other products to sell. She appreciates the help she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy oranges, pears, apples and other types of fruits to sell.

loans.name: Yguazu Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Yguazu está en su 1º ciclo  del programa de comité de Mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 2 de los 17 Señoras  se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza. Realizan constantes capacitaciones para seguir unidos y crecer juntos.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Maria tiene una pequeña despensa, en la cual desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana trabaja y lucha por su familia para poder darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Comenta que quiere poder seguir trabajando, para que su negocio siga creciendo y el día de mañana poder dar trabajo a otras personas.
Pide este préstamo para invertirlo en productos Cárnicos, Bebidas y Comestibles en general.
texts.en:
The Yguazu group is in the first cycle of the Women's Committee Program, which requires all members to make a commitment to work and support each other's efforts to succeed. The members are participating in the Poverty Elimination Survey, which has determined that two of the seventeen women are below the poverty line. The members participate in ongoing training that helps them stay united and grow together. 

One of the members is Señora Maria, who owns a small grocery store. Señora Maria works long hours, starting her day very early in the morning. She strives to provide her family with all of the things that she never had. Señora Maria says she wants to keep working so that her business will continue to grow and be able to employ people in her community.  

Señora Maria is applying for this loan to purchase meats, drinks, and general food items.

loans.use: to purchase meats, drinks, and general food items.

loans.name: Artesanas De Potrero B Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es de la ciudad de Caacupé, donde todas están poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias. Son mujeres jefas de familia, que quieren dar a sus hijos todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Julia es parte de este grupo, ella es una persona muy creativa y detallista, y lo demuestra en las obras de barro que hace, ya que por medio de este trabajo tiene los medios necesarios para poder ir mejorando su vida y la de su familia.
Pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de arcilla, ya que por medio de esto podrá seguir con sus artesanías y luchando por mejorar.
texts.en:
This group is from the city of Caacupé, where they are putting a majority of their efforts to help their families and continue moving forward. They are women leaders of the family that want to give their children everything that they did not have.

Julia is part of this group. She is a very creative and thoughtful person. She demonstrates this in the clay work she does, as with this work she has the means necessary to continue improving her life and the life of her family.

She is requesting this loan to invest it in the purchase of clay, so that she will be able to continue with her handicrafts and striving to improve.

loans.use: to purchase clay to make handicrafts.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan de 38 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 15 años y 13 años de edad. Para él lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que trabaja duramente para darles mejores oportunidades. Él se dedica a la pesca desde hace mucho tiempo este oficio es lo que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar e ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir su vivienda la cual es su principal patrimonio y futura herencia de sus hijos. Desea construir una pared de división entre la cocina y la sala de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, hierro y arena para levantar la pared lo antes posible y contar con mayor comodidad.
texts.en:
Juan is 38 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and two sons who are 15 and 13 years old. The most important thing for him is his family and he works hard to give them better opportunities.

He has worked as a fisherman for a long time. It's this job that means he can provide his family with their daily bread and keep improving their living conditions. With a lot of effort he has managed to build his house, which is his primary asset and future inheritance of his children. 

He wants to build a dividing wall between the kitchen and living room in his house so he is applying for this loan from FUSIA to invest in buying bricks, cement, iron and sand to put the wall up as soon as he can and be more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, iron and sand to build a wall.

loans.name: Luchadoras De Yanacot Group

texts.es: El grupo “LUCHADORAS DE YANACOTO” se encuentra conforma por socios trabajadoras y entusiastas por lograr una mejor calidad de vida para sus familia. Gladys tiene 33 años es soltera con 02 hijos educando. Ella hace 6 años apertura su hotel  el cual lo inicio por iniciativa propia y a la vez ofrece pensión a sus clientes fijos que tiene. Es de esta manera que puede ser madre y padre de sus dos hijos. El préstamo lo invertirá en la  renovación de su cocina comprara una licuadora y olla arrocera. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Gladys es la tercera del lado derecho.
texts.en: Luchadoras de Yanacoto communal bank's members work hard and enthusiastically to achieve a better standard of living for their families. Gladys, 33, is single and has two school-age children. She opened and has run a hotel, where she offers rooms to her regular clients, for six years. She is mother and father to her two children. She will use the loan to upgrade her kitchen by buying a blender and rice cooker.  The group thanks Kiva lenders for the funding. Gladys is the third person on the right.

loans.use: to buy a blender and rice cooker.

loans.name: Rhapael Hugo

texts.es:
Raphael es un joven de 20 años, vive en al ciudad de Pucallpa, actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera de ingeniería de sistemas en la universidad de su ciudad y trabaja como asistente en una pequeña empresa, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para solventar sus gastos.

Raphael está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado podrá comprar enseres para su hogar como ollas, platos, entre otros  ya que debido a las lluvias que ha habido en su ciudad sus enseres se han malogrado, de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar su carrera y poder formar una empresa”.
texts.en:
Raphael, 20, lives in the city of Pucallpa. Currently, he is studying systems engineering at the university in town. He also works as an assistant for a small business, which helps him earn income to pay his expenses.

Raphael is grateful for Kiva loans because, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy essentials for his home like pots, plates, and others. Because of the rain in his city, his essentials have been ruined. This will improve his quality of life and allow him to keep working toward his greatest dream: to finish school and and start a business.

loans.use: to buy essential goods like pots, plates, etc., for his home

loans.name: Marco Rafael

texts.es:
Marco tiene 40 años de edad, vive en casa propia en la parroquia Belisario Quevedo perteneciente a la provincia de Cotopaxi, nació en la ciudad de Latacunga, conocida como el Pensil de los Andes.
Tiene tres hijos y viven en casa propia junto con su esposa e hijos, dos de ellos son profesionales, Marco pudo solamente terminar la primaria ya que sus padres no contaban con el dinero suficiente para poder darle la educación, es por eso que desde muy joven empezó a trabajar y a sobresalir gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio.
Marco fue recomendado por un cliente de la Fundación, tuvo momentos difíciles en su vida ya que uno de sus hijos tuvo un accidente doméstico en donde lamentablemente  el pequeño de apenas 4 años de edad perdió uno de sus ojos, y desde ahí ha gastado mucho por los implantes de córnea a los cuales ha sido sometido, su esposa trabaja con él tiene su taller mecánico en su misma casa, Marco es mecánico automotriz en enderezada y pintura y además hace trabajos de mecánica industrial, por todo esto a Marco se lo calificar como un hombre muy responsable y trabajador.
Con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo de Marco y de su esposa han podido sacar adelante a sus hijos, los mismos que ya son mayores de edad y están estudiando en la universidad.
En su mecánica Marco trabaja de 8 a 10 horas diarias, hoy están solicitado un crédito que será invertido en un tratamiento para su hijo. Marco se ha esforzado para sacar adelante a su  esposa y sus  hijos siendo éstos su mayor orgullo y por eso está muy agradecido con  Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Marco is 40 years old. He lives in his own house in the parish of Belisario Quevedo, belonging to the province of Cotopaxi. He was born in the city of Latacunga, known as "The Beautiful Garden of the Andes".

He has three children, and he lives in his own house with his wife and children. Two of them are professionals. Marco was only able to finish primary school, since his parents didn't have enough money to give him an education. Therefore, since he was very young, he started working and overcoming thanks to his efforts and sacrifice.

Marco was recommended by one of Fundación's clients. He had difficult times in his life since one of his sons had a household accident where unfortunately, the little boy barely four years old lost one of his eyes. Since then, he has spent a lot on corneal implants that his son has undergone.

His wife works with him; he has a mechanic shop in his house. Marco is an automotive mechanic in body work and painting. In addition, he does industrial mechanical work. Because of all this, Marco defines himself as a very responsible and hardworking man.

With a lot of sacrifice and effort, Marco and his wife have been able to get their children ahead, who are already grown and studying at the university. In his mechanic shop, Marco works 8 to 10 hour days.

Today, he is requesting a loan that will be invested in treatment for his son. Marco has made an effort to get his wife and his children ahead; they are his greatest pride, and therefore, he is very grateful to Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making this growth in his professional and personal life possible.

loans.use: to get medical treatment for his son, who suffered an accident and lost one of his eyes.

loans.name: Jesus Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jesús del Carmen tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en San Jacinto una zona rural de Morropon dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedican a la venta de animales menores, en la parte posterior a su domicilio, El ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados y una segunda parte para la compra de animales menores y de esta manera ofrecerlos a sus clientes, generándoles mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Jesús del Carmen, who is 38, lives with his wife in San Jacinto, a rural area in Morropon province which is two hours away from the city of Piura, on Peru's north coast.

He and his wife sell small animals from the yard at the back of their home.  Jesús has applied for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to buy animal feed and a second instalment to buy small animals which he can offer to his customers and consequently generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and pigs and turkeys to fatten up.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luis tiene 28 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos en el distrito de Zaña, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales comercio de dulces a una hora con cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica junto a su familia a la crianza y venta de carneros, chivos y aves, su esposa prepara alimentos para vender y de esta manera contribuye con los gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 4 000 nuevos soles para la compra de una mototaxi para trasladar sus animales a zonas aledañas a su distrito para ofrecerlos a la venta y de esta manera ahorrarse el alquiler de movilidad, generandole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Luis, 28, lives in Zaña with his wife and children. The district of Zaña is about forty-five minutes from Chiclayo, a city on the north coast of Peru. Fruit crops are a major source of income for local people.

Jose Luis and his family raise farm animals--goats and poultry--for sale. His wife makes and sells food and their combined income is enough to support their family.

Jose Luis is applying for a 4,000 new soles loan, which he will use to buy a vehicle for transporting the animals he raises to markets in the surrounding area, and will therefore save the on the costs of transporting his animals, generating higher income for his family.

loans.use: to pay for both a rental property and a vehicle for transporting his stock.

loans.name: Cesar Yovany

texts.es:
Cesar Yovany tiene 37 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos en el distrito de Oyotun, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedican a la crianza y venta de animales de corral patos, pollos y cuyes, El se dedica a labores de jornalería en la zona rural de su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados y así tener una mejor producción para ofrece a sus clientes.
texts.en:
César Yovany, 37, lives with his wife and children in the Oyotún district, two hours from the city of Chiclayo on the northern coast of Peru.  The people there make a living in agriculture, commerce, and ranching.

He and his wife make a living raising and selling barnyard animals: ducks, chickens, and guinea pigs.  He works as a day laborer in the rural area of his region.

He has requested a loan for 1,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy balanced feed so he has better products to sell to his customers.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es: El señor Juan tiene 34 años, es soltero y vive en la casa de su mamá, poco a poco se está independizando haciéndose sus propias cosas, trabaja en calidad de propietario de su mismo vehículo en el sector del transporte en una empresa de radio taxi con una antigüedad de tres años de lunes a sábado, actualmente solicita un crédito para la refacción y mantenimiento de su vehículo para poder brindar un servicio más eficiente a sus clientes y de esa manera obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Juan is 34 years old, he is single and he lives in his mother's house. He is progressively building his economic independence, and he has been working for three years in the transportation services with his own vehicle. He is a taxi driver with a radio taxi company, and he works Mondays to Saturdays. He is currently requesting a loan to have his car mended, in order to succeed in offering a more efficient service to his customers, consequently increasing his income.

loans.use: To pay for the maintenance of his vehicle.

loans.name: Placida

texts.es:
Placida es una mujer muy trabajadora, para poder salir adelante trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de quesos y leche de vaca, asimismo en su vivienda tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas y cervezas, Placida cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable y sobre todo amable con los clientes.

Placida está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le están brindando ella podrá apoyar a uno de sus hijo con los gastos de matricula e inscripción para la universidad policial, de esta manera podrá brindarle educación a su hijo y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Ver a sus con una profesión y ser una gran distribuidora de alimentos”.
texts.en:
Placida works hard to get ahead in her small cheese and milk shop. She also runs a business selling sodas and beer from her house. Placida believes her business is doing well because she is responsible and treats her customers well.

Placida thanks the Kiva lenders, whose funding will help one of her children pay tuition and application fees for a police academy. She will be able to provide her son with an education and keep striving to achieve her great dream: to see her children follow a career and to become a major food distributor.

loans.use: to pay tuition and fees.

loans.name: Pantaleón

texts.es:
Pantaleón es un hombre soltero de 38 años de edad, vive junto a su pareja y sus nueve hijos en el Departamento de Sololá.
Don Pantaleón comenta que se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando papa y cebolla en unos terrenos que él tiene. Eligió esta actividad porque su padre le enseño este oficio desde que era pequeño. A través de lo que realiza obtiene buenos ingresos y ganancias que le ayudan a cubrir los gastos de su familia.
Ahora él ha observado que en esta época del año la demanda de estas verduras aumenta, por lo que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 9,000.00 para la compra de semillas de papa, cebolla y abono orgánico, que servirá para cosecharlo y luego comercializarlo.
Su mayor sueño es incrementar más sus ganancias para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Pantaleón, 38, is single and lives with his partner and their nine children in the Sololá department. Pantaleón is a farmer and grows potatoes and onions on the land he owns. He chose this trade because he learned it from his father as a child, and he earns a good income and profit that helps cover his household expenses. 

He sees that demand for vegetables is higher at this time of year. So he has applied for a loan of Q 9,000 to buy potato and onion seeds and organic fertilizer to produce a harvest to sell. His great dream is to earn more to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy potato and onion seeds and organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Roxana Maribel

texts.es: Roxana de 34 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos de 17 años y 14 años de edad. Roxana es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida como empelada doméstica en casa particular desde hace mucho tiempo. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación de dos paredes de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro.
texts.en: Roxana is 34 years old and lives in a home of her own with her children, ages 17 and 14.  Roxana is a hardworking woman who earns a living as a domestic employee in a private home.  She wants to improve her living conditions so she is asking for a loan through FUSAI so she can repair the walls in her home.  She will use the money from this loan to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and iron bars.

loans.use: to repair the walls in her home.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a 40-year-old married woman and the mother of six children. The man shown in the photo is Shahnaz’s husband, who is a fish seller by profession. He has been selling fishes for many years to meet the family’s expenses. He is a well-known seller in their community, and he counts a good client list. 

In order to meet the everyday expenditures with educational expenses, more income is required, so Shahnaz contacted Kashf foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 50,000. 

Her husband will utilize this loan amount to purchase a new, bigger-size cart to sell fishes door to door to the people of their community. Shahnaz is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business. 

Their dream is to maximize their profit from this business and have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a new, bigger-size cart.

loans.name: Milka

texts.es: Milka, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer con muchos deseos de superación, además  de ser alegre, amable y muy trabajadora, es soltera, no tiene hijos. Vive en la casa de sus padres. La actividad laboral que realiza Milka, es la venta de bebidas heladas como gaseosas, cervezas y sabrosos helados de marcas reconocidas elaboradas de frutas tropicales, para eso cuenta con una congeladora en el que muestra las bebidas y una exhibidora para la venta de los helados dejada en consignación por la empresa distribuidora, ha establecido su negocio en un ambiente acondicionado en su propia casa, lleva dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace 02 años atendiendo sola muy amablemente a todos sus clientes. Le gusta su trabajo pues le permite estar en casa para atender apoyar a sus padres con la economía de su hogar, viendo los buenos resultados que tiene y las ganancias que le genera su trabajo decidió continuar desarrollando este negocio, tiene planes de ampliarlo y abrir un bodega para la venta de abarrotes y otros productos. En esta oportunidad solicitara  1000 nuevos soles, está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, ya que así se siente mas segura de avanzar con su trabajo, asimismo se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de gaseosas, cervezas y helados para continuar vendiendo en su casa.
texts.en:
Milka is 30 years old, and is a woman with many desires to excel.  As well as being sociable, friendly, and a hard worker, she is single and has no children.  She lives in her house with her parents.

Milka sells cold drinks such as soft drinks, beer, and tasty ice cream brands made of tropical fruits.  She has a freezer to display the drinks and ice cream she has for sale.  She has the freezer on consignment from the distributor.  

She has established her business in a conditioned environment at her own home.  She has worked in this activity for 2 years, attending to all her clients in a friendly way.  She likes her work because it permits her to be in her house to take care of her children and support her partner with the economy of the home.  

Seeing the good results she has had, and the profits she has generated, she decided to continue to develop her business.  She has plants to expand it and open a store to sell groceries and other products. For this opportunity, she will request 1000 new soles.  

She is very happy to know that she has financial support, and with this feels more secure to move forward with her work.  She also promises to pay the money she owes in a timely manner. She will use this loan to buy more soft drinks, beer and ice cream to continue to sell at home.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale beverages

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Maria Auxiliadora está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité, donde ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer la situación de cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
Casilda es una persona muy trabajadora, quien se esfuerza y lucha por poder dar a su familia lo que necesitan y de esa forma poder cubrir el día a día. Ella se dedica a la venta de leche, y comenta que su día a día empieza muy temprano, ya que debe de poner su producto en la mesa de sus clientes para el desayuno.
Pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de leche, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con sus ventas y mejorando cada día sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Maria Auxiliadora is on its sixth cycle of the program committee. They are part of the program to eliminate poverty, to know each other's situations and to work.
Casilda is a hardworking person who strives and struggles to give her family what they need to survive from day to day. She sells milk and mentions that she starts her day very early. She has to put her products on the tables of her customers for breakfast. 
She requested this loan to invest in the purchase of milk. With this investment, she can continue with her sales and improve her profits everyday.

loans.use: purchase milk to sell.

loans.name: Guisella

texts.es: Guisella, de 54 años, es una joven mujer, alegre, amable y emprendedora, es soltera y tienes 4 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Guisella, consiste en la venta de comida, vende por las noches diversos platos regionales, su puesto de venta esta ubicado en una esquina muy concurrida cerca de su vivienda. Durante las tardes realiza la preparación de cada uno de los platos que deleitan el paladar de sus clientes diariamente. Trabaja con ayuda de dos personas más. Ella trabaja en este rubro laboral desde hace 10 años. Le gusta trabajar de esta manera ya que dispone de tiempo para poder hacer varias actividades y así puede darle el tiempo necesario a su pequeño hijo quien a su edad necesita mucho de ella para poder tener una base fuerte de su alimentación, desea mas adelante tener un local en donde acondicionar y empezar a vender en mas grandes cantidades. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 400, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado comprará progresivamente los ingredientes e insumos que necesita para seguir con su trabajo tales como arroz, huevos, aceituna, pollo, pescados, y otros.
texts.en:
Guisella, is 54 years young, happy, kind, and resourceful. She is the single mother of four children who live in the family's home. 

Guisella has worked for 10 years selling regional food in the evenings at a busy intersection near her home. She spends her afternoons preparing each dish that will delight a customer's palate that night. Guisella employs two people who help her. She likes her work schedule as it allows her time to do various things and spend time with her youngest son, who, at his age, relies heavily on his mother to provide him a healthy, adequate diet. 

Guisella would like to have a bigger site in the future, one that would allow her to sell more food. She is applying for a loan of S./400, and is pleased to know that she'll have financial support that will allow her to improve her business. She is also committed to making timely monthly payments. Guisella will use the loan funds to gradually purchase the ingredients and supplies she needs to keep preparing her dishes, such as rice, eggs, olives, chicken, fish, and other items.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as rice, eggs, olives, and other items.

loans.name: Danicsa

texts.es: Danicsa de 20 años, está soltera y no tiene hijos aun vive en la casa de sus padres. El trabajo de Danicsa consiste en la venta de productos comestibles como arroz, azúcar, leche, papel higiénico, azúcar, aceite, entre otros. Su tienda está instalada en el frontis de su casa y es la única de su localidad por lo cual sus ventas están aseguradas y sus ganancias económicas estables. Lleva trabajando en esta activad mas de 2 años. Se inició vendiendo productos en pequeñas cantidades, ahora vende mucho más y le va muy bien, tiene la ayuda de su madre con quien organiza su día laboral. Le va muy bien ya que tiene muchos clientes, le agrada disponer de su tiempo ya que así puede realizar otras actividades, se siente satisfecha siendo ella misma quien genera su fuente laboral es por eso que desea seguir adelante y con el paso del tiempo establecer una tienda más amplia.  En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su negocio. Con el monto solicitado comprará arroz, azúcar, leche, huevos, entre otros.
texts.en: Danisca is 20 years old, single, doesn’t have any children, and still lives in her parents’ home.   Danicsa sells grocery products such as rice, sugar, milk, toilet paper, oil, and other items.  Her store is set up at the front of her house, and it is the only one in her area, so her sales are assured and her profits are stable.  She has been working in this activity more than two years.  She began selling products in small quantities, and now sells much more and it is going well because she has many customers.  Her mother helps organize her workday and she appreciates his help arranging her schedule because, in this way, she can engage in other activities.  She feels satisfied because she herself is generating a source of income and for this reason, she wishes to continue moving ahead and, with time, establish a larger store.  At this time, she is requesting S/. 500 and she is very happy knowing that she will have financial assistance because, in this way, she will feel more secure in moving her business forward.  With the requested amount, she will purchase rice, sugar, milk, eggs, and other items..

loans.use: to purchase grocery products such as rice, sugar, milk, and other items.

loans.name: Vasati

texts.en: Vasati is 18 years old and single with no children. She has a small garden where she grows cabbages, cucumbers, eggplants and green beans that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years. Vasati needs a loan to buy rakes, chemicals, fertilizers, seeds and a wheelbarrow. She joined SBPD this year. Vasati will use the profits from her sales to improve her business and support her family.

loans.use: to pay for rakes, chemicals, fertilizers, seeds and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Itagia

texts.en:
Itagia  is a 26-year-old woman who is single, with no children. She runs a business, tailoring clothes in her community. She has three years of experience with this business. 

Itagia has requested a loan to buy needles, threads, materials, and a sewing machine. She plans to use her profits to not only extend her business, but to support her family and her children's education, as well. 

She joined South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy items for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Reyna Liliana

texts.es:
Reyna Liliana tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Oyotun su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz, comercio y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral, en la parte posterior a su domicilio y de esta manera contribuye con los gastos familiares, Reyna es una mujer emprendedora ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados y construir la ultima parte de los corrales donde cría sus animales.
texts.en:
Reyna is 38 and lives with her husband in the district of Oyotun, where the population is employed in sugar cane and rice cultivation, commerce and stock breeding. It is located two hours from the city of Chiclayo on the northern coast of Peru.

Reyna works at raising farmyard birds behind her home, and in this way helps with the family bills. She is an enterprising woman, who is asking for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles in order to buy formulated feed and to build the last part of the pens where she raises her animals.

loans.use: Compra de alimentos balanceados  para animales menores y construcción de corrales de los mismos.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: La señora Julia tiene 32 años, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos que dependen de ella, vive en la Ciudad de Monteagudo, obtuvo el título de confección de ropa deportiva y trabaja en eso desde su propio domicilio. Requiere un crédito de Bs. 21000 para la compra de materia prima (telas e hilos) y maquina de costurar, con el fin de aumentar su trabajo y obtener mayores ingresos para ofrecerle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Julia is 32 years old. She is married and has four children who depend on her. She lives in Monteagudo City. She got a degree in making sportswear and works in this field from home.

She needs a loan of Bs. 21000 to buy raw material (fabric and yarn) and a sewing machine, in order to increase her work and earn more income to offer her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy raw material (fabric and yarn) and a sewing machine

loans.name: Jemina Lidia

texts.es:
Jemina tiene 37 años de edad, ella es soltera, vive con sus padres en la calurosa ciudad de Pucallpa. Jemina trabaja como profesora hace muchos años, ella es una persona muy responsable y alegre, siempre está pendiente de que sus alumnos  aprendan cada día mas y asi logren ser unos buenos profesionales.
Jemnina, está muy agradecida con los prestatarios KIVA, ya que el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y otros artículos de vestir, ella desea tener otros ingresos y así lograr cumplir su sueño de tener su casa propia  y obtener su titulo de estudios.
texts.en:
Jemnina  is 37 years old, single, and lives with her parents in the warm city of Pucallpa.  Jemina has been working as a teacher for many years and she is a responsible and happy person, always making sure that her students learn more each day so that they will become good professionals.

Jemnina  is grateful to the Kiva lenders and will use the money to buy clothing and other dressing articles.  She wants to have another source of income so she can achieve her dream of having a house of her own and earn her studies title.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Carmencita

texts.en:
Carmencita is 47 years old and married with four children. With four children in school, Carmencita works very hard to provide for them.

Carmencita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,500 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks like biscuits, candies, noodles, bread, shampoo, cooking oil and other groceries to sell in her general store. Carmencita has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future, Carmencita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stocks like biscuits, candies, noodles, bread, shampoo, cooking oil and other groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en:
Carolina is 53 years old and married with five children.

Carolina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more goods to sell in her general store.

Carolina has borrowed and paid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 16 years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

Carolina aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from selling school supplies. Catalina is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional items like soft drinks, snack foods, biscuits, seasonings, bath soap, etc. to sell.

Catalina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like soft drinks, snack foods, biscuits, seasonings, bath soap, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Yaneri

texts.es: Yaneri, con tan sólo 20 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos de 6 y 3 años y vive en unión libre con su compañero sentimental. Se trasladó a la ciudad hace aproximadamente dos años, en busca de nuevas oportunidades para salir adelante, pero le ha sido difícil emplearse en una empresa por la falta de experiencia laboral; esto la impulsó a tomar la decisión de iniciar su propio negocio, una legumbrería en la que ofrecerá diversas frutas y verduras, adicionalmente desea implementar una venta de alimentos fritos como empanadas, pasteles, buñuelos, entre otros para complementar los ingresos con los que espera poder apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar. Su empuje y espíritu emprendedor la llevan a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar  una estantería para almacenar las frutas y verduras, surtir las frutas y verduras al por mayor, comprar una freidora y una pipeta de gas propano, así podrá dar inicio a su proyecto productivo con el que espera poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Yaneri es consciente que para lograr sus objetivos y sacar adelante su negocio, debe trabajar con disciplina, empeño y mucha dedicación, pues esta es la clave para tener éxito y así poder seguir avanzando hacia la consecución de sus sueños, especialmente el de realizar su actividad en un local propio, que le genere mejor rentabilidad y así poder dar un mejor futuro a sus hijos, lleno de oportunidades para progresar y ser personas íntegras y exitosas.
texts.en:
Yaneri, 20, is the mother of two children, ages 6 and 3.  She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner.  She moved to the city about two years ago looking for new opportunities to get ahead.

It has been difficult to find a job in a business, however, because she lacks work experience.  This motivated her to start her own business, a vegetable shop where she sells a variety of fruits and vegetables.  She also wants to start selling fried foods like empanadas, pastry, fried dough, and other things to supplement her income.  She hopes to support her husband with the financial responsibility of the household.

Her drive and enterprising spirit lead her to request the support of the loan, with which she wants to buy shelves to store the produce, produce wholesale, shelving, and a tank of propane gas.  This way she can begin her work project, with which she hopes to be able to improve her family's living conditions.

Yaneri knows that to achieve her goals and get her business ahead she has to work with discipline, determination, and a lot of dedication.  This is the key to success and being able to keep on making progress toward realizing her dreams.  She especially dreams of having her own store, which will generate more profits for her so she can give her children a better future that is full of opportunities to advance and be honest and successful people.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, a deep fryer, and propane gas

loans.name: Yurany Estefanía

texts.es: Yurany, es una joven emprendedora que, con tan sólo 22 años de edad se dedica a atender su propio negocio, un almacén de bolsos ubicado en el parque principal del municipio donde reside, allí trabaja todos los días de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm y de esta manera genera los ingresos económicos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga del hogar. La idea surgió como alternativa para ganar dinero por cuenta propia, luego de haber adquirido experiencia trabajando como vendedora en diferentes almacenes. Su empuje, espíritu de superación y la nobleza que la caracterizan le ha permitido lograr los objetivos que se propone y por ello, solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar mercancía al por mayor (bolsos, maletas, morrales, cosmetiqueras, entre otros), esto le permitirá ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos para así satisfacer los gustos y requerimientos de sus clientes, logrando mejorar las ventas especialmente en la temporada de navidad que se aproxima, dando como resultado una mejoría notable en las ganancias que obtiene. Yurany manifiesta que debe seguir luchando para obtener los resultados que espera, pues es ambiciosa y por ello quiere acreditar bien su negocio para que éste sea rentable y le permita ser perdurable en el tiempo para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Yurany is an enterprising young woman who at only 22 years old attends to her own business, a handbag store located in the main municipal park where she lives. She works there every day from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm and in this way generates sufficient income to support her husband in maintaining their home. The idea came as a way for her to earn her own money after having acquired experience as a salesperson in different stores. Her drive, spirit to succeed, and noble character has permitted her to achieve her goals and those of her business. She seeks a loan with which she can buy merchandise at wholesale (purses, suitcases, satchels, cosmetic bags, and others). This will enable her to offer a greater variety of products in order to satisfy her customer's likes and needs, achieving better sales during the Christmas season that is approaching, thus increasing the earnings she obtains. Yurany states that she will keep fighting in order to obtain the results that she hopes for, as she is ambitious and she wants her business to be profitable and continuously over time have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale (purses, satchels, suitcases, cosmetic bags, and others).

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila is a 35-year-old married women. She has one child. She wishes to provide a quality education and all facilities of life to her child. 

Her husband owns a small embroidery business. He has excellent embroidery skills. All of his customers appreciate his work. He is an honest person who always works with full honesty and dedication. 

Presently, he needs to purchase embroidery material to continue his work. He wants to purchase a variety of threads and needles and a new embroidery machine, as the previous embroidery machine has stopped working. For that, his wife, Jamila, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of threads and needles and a new embroidery machine.

loans.name: Yesenia Abigail

texts.es: Yesenia de 28 años de edad habita junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 3 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de chocolate artesanal preparado por ella misma. Además, también vende mariscos como: camarones, conchas y pescado. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. Para ella y su compañero de vida lo más importante es que su hijo crezca  y se desarrolle en condiciones seguras y estables. Con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus familia ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSIA para comprar de los insumos para la preparación del chocolate tales como: cacao, azúcar, canela así como variedad de mariscos para tener una mayor oferta y lograr aumentar sus ventas y sus ingresos y de esta forma lograr mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Yesenia is 28 years old and lives with her life’s partner and three year old son.  She sells artesian chocolate that she makes herself.  She also sells seafood such as shrimp, clams, and fish in her area.  The most important thing for her and her partner is for their son to grow and develop under safe and stable conditions.  In order to improve her and her family’s quality of life, she decided to invest into her business, so she is asking for a loan through FUSIA, to buy supplies, such as cacao, sugar, and cinnamon with which to prepare chocolate, as well as a variety of seafood so she can have a better selection and increase her sales and income.  This way she can improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa alquilada con su compañero de vida, sus dos hijos y su suegra, desde hace 3 años ella posee una venta de pupusas ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 3 años, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios como: frijoles, chicharrón, quesillo, maíz, tomates, repollos, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: She lives in a rented home with her life’s partner, two children, and mother in law.  She has had a store in her home for three years and she has many customers because of her good prices and friendliness at sale time.  She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise such as beans, fried pork rinds, cheese, corn, tomatoes, etc. so she can continue working and have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: maría habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo, ella se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir. El negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación. Maria es una mujer increíble y muy ejemplar ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable, además muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona y de su trabajo. Elabora variedad de prendas de vestir  a precios muy accesibles. También ofrece calidad en su trabajo, razón por la cual muchas personas la prefieren. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y sobre todo con clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder mejorar su vivienda ya que desea instalar la electricidad para tener una mejor iluminación,y poder pagar la mano de obra por esa razón solicita dicho crédito, Todo esto lo hace con el fin de dar un mejor servicio a los clientes y que puedan trabajar mejor.
texts.en:
María lives in a home she owns together with her husband.  She earns a living in the manufacture and sale of clothing.  This business is located in her home.  María is an amazing and very exemplary woman; she is hardworking, responsible, and additionally many people provide good references for her and her work.  She produces a variety of clothing at very affordable prices and offers quality work, which is why many people favor her.

María has devoted many years to this work so she already has a lot of experience and many regular customers who favor her more every day.  She has made the decision to apply for this loan from INTEGRAL in order to improve her home.  She wants to install electricity to have better lighting and seeks the loan to pay for the associated labor.  She is doing all of this with the goal of offering better service to her customers and so that she can work better.

loans.use: to pay for the labor to install electricity.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos de 10 años, 5 años y 13 años de edad. José trabaja como jornalero y pescador desde hace 10 años. Trabaja mucho para sacar el ingreso que le permita dar a su familia lo necesario. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales ya que el  techo de la vivienda se encuentra dañado y cuando llueve el agua se filtra dañando sus pocas pertenencias. Actualmente el techo de la casa tiene teja y desea poner lámina galvanizada debajo de la teja para que tenga un mejor soporte y protección. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en: José, 33, lives in his own house with his life partner and their three children, ages 10, 5, and 13. José has worked as a day laborer and fisherman for 10 years. He works hard to earn enough to give his family what it needs. He wants to make improvements to his house, as the roof is damaged. When it rains, the water seeps through and damages their few belongings. The roof is tiled, and he wants to put galvanized sheets under the tiles for more support and protection. He has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized sheets, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, and nails to repair his roof.

loans.name: Godwin

texts.en:
Godwin is 35 years old and lives in the town of Lbanda in the region of Mbarara in Uganda. He is married and has 3 children who are all currently in school. For the past 3 years, Godwin has been working hard to manage his rental business, which hires out rental houses. 

To help expand his business, Godwin has requested a loan of  Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to expand on his business by building more rentals and will help Godwin to generate greater profits and improve on his income and educate his children. Godwin hopes that in the future he will be able to to own a bigger business. 

Godwin is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Godwin who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.


"

loans.use: to expand on his business by building more rentals.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio tiene 37 años de edad, vive en el distrito de La Matanza, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus clientes a las zonas aledañas a su distrtio, tambien se dedica a la venta de animales menores cerdos, pavos, gallinas y patos, lo ofrece en el mercado del distrito.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para darle mantenimiento a su vehículo y una segunda parte parte para la construcción de corrales para una granja de cerdos y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sergio is 37 years old and lives in the district of La Matanza, located two hours from the city of Piura along the northern coast of Peru. His community is known for its fruit production. 

Sergio offers transportation services on his own mototaxi, moving customers to surrounding areas in his district, and also works raising and selling small animals such as pigs, turkeys, hens and ducks, which he sells in the local market. 

He is currently asking for a loan of 3,000 soles, which he will use to perform maintenance on his vehicle, as well as to buy construction materials for a new pig pen. This will enable him to improve his earnings and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his vehicle and buy construction materials for a new pig pen

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 23 years old and lives with his family in Gaza. He left his education at the secondary stage. Two years ago, he started his own internet coffee shop business for games and internet usage in his town. It was an impressive step forward and that's why he is working hard to improve it.

Ahmad still needs to improve his business so he asked Ryada for this youth loan to buy two other computers  to increase his customers which will lead to increased income.

Ahmad hopes that someday his shop will be the most well known shop in his town.

loans.use: to buy two other computers to increase his customers which will lead to increased income.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a married man. He has 2 children. He operates a retail store where he sells motor vehicle accessories and spare parts. He has been involved in this business for 2 years. 

His business is located in a potential area and his primary customers are motor vehicle owners. He describes his biggest business challenge to be convincing buyers to buy his products. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to add stock of motor vehicle spare parts and other motor vehicle accessories. His goal is to own a car within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will have a stable business. He will use the anticipated profits to open a shop to sell his goods.

loans.use: to add stock of motor vehicle spare parts and other motor vehicle  accessories.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Meet Rosemary, a farmer living in Nyamira.  She is married and has four children, all of school-going age.

She has been in farming for two years, producing and selling milk, eggs, and maize.  In farming she enjoys poultry rearing because it is an area that has not been invested in in her area; but her fear is poultry diseases, which make the poultry succumb to the diseases.

Rosemary chose Juhudi Kilimo because of their easy mode of repaying a loan, which is according to a farmer's ability.

She plans to invest more in poultry with the loan accorded to her.  This will bring in more income, which will help her provide better education for her four children and also cater to the needs of her household.

loans.use: To purchase more poultry.

loans.name: Aniele

texts.en:
Aniele, 23, was born and has always lived in São Paulo. Since she was young she has worked as a hairdresser, learning the trade at age 14 while working as a nanny in a family home where the children's mother was a hairdresser. She gradually taught Aniele, and since then Aniele has taken several courses to perfect her skills.

She is married and has a child who is 2 months old; she loves to be with him. Today she has a space to meet her customers, but she needs to buy equipment to increase the number of customers and also offer her best quality work. In the hall her mother works doing manicures and waxing, and her brother does men's haircuts. She enlists the help of her sister to take care of the baby.

loans.use: To buy a shelf, chair, table, comb and scissors

loans.name: Maria Irma

texts.es:
María Irma es una señora de 49 años de edad, ama de casa y agricultora, casada que de su matrimonio tiene 2 hijos y que únicamente solo uno depende de ellos el cual estudia en la escuela de la comunidad. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria completo gracias al apoyo financiero brindado por sus padres quienes la apoyaron a pesar de poca economía en su hogar ya que ella desciende de una familia muy humilde económicamente. Ella se dedica a la caficultura hace muchos años siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra y en compañía de sus esposo trabaja desde hace 20 años aproximadamente involucrándose únicamente ellos dos y su hijo mayor. La tierra que trabajan es propia la cual está ubicada a 20 minutos desde su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan caminando para asistirla.
Sus planes en un futuro es poder cultivar una mejor variedad de café con la cual pueda ofrecer y competir en el mercado para poder salir adelante y algún día poder sacarlo del país como un producto de calidad. Su sueño para su negocio y su familia es obtener una mayor producción como lo dijo anteriormente y poder completar la educación de su hijo menor hasta llegar a la universidad.    
Ella ha solicitado apoyo financiero a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para poder comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, urea, formula cafetalera, que ayuden a mantener sus cultivos de café protegidos de la roya y de la broca entre otros bichos y enfermedades que deterioran la cosecha.
texts.en:
María Irma, 49, is a homemaker and farmer. She is married and has two children, one of whom is still a minor and is attending a local school. Her parents, though they had few resources and the family was poor, helped María Irma finish elementary school. She has been farming for many years, as her parents taught her how to work the land. She has been working alongside her husband and her oldest son for about 20 years. They own the land they cultivate, which is about a 20-minute walk from their house.

Her plan is to grow a greater variety of coffees to offer in the market so that they can support themselves and one day export a quality product. Her dream for her business and family is to produce more and pay for her youngest son's education through college.
    
She has applied to COMIXMUL for a loan to buy agricultural supplies like fertilizer, urea, and coffee nutrients to tend to her crops and protect them from berry borer, coffee rust, and other insects and diseases that damage the harvest.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Mwanatumu

texts.en:
Mwanatumu is a married woman with five children, three of whom attend school and two of whom are adults. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past thirteen years, Mwanatumu has operated a retail shop business, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 50,000, she wants to purchase maize flour, soap, rice, beans, and cooking oil for resale. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, soap, rice, beans, and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Khursheed's Group

texts.en:
Khursheed is 45 years old and lives with her six children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her son has been running a mobile-phone shop for a couple of years and earning sufficient income. With troubleshooting the mobiles, he also sells the mobile accessories such as chargers, bodies, data cables, etc., and provides the recharge facilities of different networks. 

Nowadays a lot of demand has increased for mobile accessories and for recharging.  Sometimes he has to refuse his customers. But he does not have savings to further invest into his business because he already has spent his all savings on household expenses. 

Therefore, Khursheed has requested a loan so she can empower her son so he can buy additional accessories and extra credit for recharge facilities. 

Khursheed thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan, over this honorable support.

loans.use: To buy mobile-phone accessories for her son to sell.

loans.name: Alba Patricia

texts.es:
Alba, a sus 38 años de edad, es casada y madre de dos hijos adolescentes. Nació en el seno de una familia campesina que desde muy niña le enseñaron todas las labores del campo y, gracias a ello, hoy en día posee un cultivo de hortensias, en el que genera 4 empleos directos y trabaja todos los días para sacarlo adelante; adicionalmente es propietaria de una pequeña tienda de abarrotes ubicada en una vereda cercana, con la que complementa los ingresos para aportar a la economía de su familia. 

La cliente se caracteriza por ser una mujer organizada y emprendedora, se proyecta metas por las cuales lucha incansablemente para lograrlas; su objetivo principal es poder ampliar sus cultivos e introducir otras variedades de flores para así ampliar su mercado y ser más competitiva en el sector. 

Esto la impulsa a solicitar el crédito con el que desea comprar un cultivo de rosas que le están ofreciendo, ubicado en la misma vereda donde tiene ubicada su tienda, esto le permitirá fortalecer aún más su actividad y estará en la capacidad de generar mayor producción y mejores ingresos, pues sus ventas aumentarán gracias a la diversidad de flores que podrá vender. 

De esta manera Alba podrá seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de sus sueños, especialmente el de seguir ampliando sus cultivos y así ofrecer nuevas oportunidades de empleo, lo que para ella significa mejorar no sólo la calidad de vida de su familia, sino ayudar a otras personas a salir adelante, generando un mejor bienestar en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Alba, at 38 years old, is married and is the mother of two teenagers. She was born into a farming family, and since where was young was taught all about farm work. Thanks to this, she today has a business growing hydrangeas, which employs 4 workers and she work everyday to keep improving it.

Alba also owns a small store located in a nearby village, supplementing the income to contribute to her family's income. She is an organized and enterprising woman , identifying goals and then fighting tirelessly to achieve them. Her main goal is to expand her flower production and  and introduce other varieties of flowers, to increase her offerings and be more competitive in the local market. 

This encouraged her to apply for a loan, with which she will buy a crop of roses for sale, located in the same area where her store is located. This will allow her to further strengthen her business and give her the ability to generate increased production and better income. She will also increase sales thanks to the diversity of her flower offering. 

This will allow Alba to continue moving forward towards fulfilling her dreams , especially her dream to grow her production and therefore offer new employment opportunities , which for her means improving not only the quality of life for his family, but to help others to get ahead, creating a better welfare in society.

loans.use: to buy roses for her flower business

loans.name: Maria Doris

texts.es: Maria de 63 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo,  ella tiene una pequeña tienda en la que vende productos perecederos como refrescos, golosinas, granos básicos, etc. a través de  este comercio ha podido salir adelante junto con su esposo. Ella busca mejorar su calidad  de  vida,  por lo que solicita un crédito para incrementar la variedad de sus  artículos en su tienda, como: granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, aceite, azúcar, café, productos desechables, etc.  lo que le permitiría incrementar las ganancias de  su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de ella y de su esposo.
texts.en:
Maria is 63 and lives in her own house together with her husband. She has a small shop where she sells perishable goods such as snacks, sweets, staple grains, etc, She and her husband have together managed to get ahead in life by means of this business. She is looking to improve her quality of life.

This is why Maria is asking for a loan. She will use it to increase the range of goods in her shop, such as staple grains, snacks, sweets, oil, sugar, coffee, disposable products, etc. This would allow her to increase her business profits and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, snacks, sweets, oil, sugar, coffee, disposable products, etc.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 19 years old and single, with no children. 

She has a small plantation where she grows cabbages, beans, cucumbers, and pumpkins to earn a living.  She has been doing this for two years. 

Marina has requested a loan to use to purchase fertilizer, chemicals, bush knives, weed killer, a shovel, rakes, etc. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011.

With her profits, Marina hopes to improve her plantation and support her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, chemicals, bush knives, weed killer, a shovel, rakes, etc

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell for her rice business.

Mercedita has been in this business for 27 years.  She earns other income from pig fattening.

Mercedita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding  her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 56 years old and married.

Helen is in the agricultural business, raising chickens in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

Helen has been raising chickens for eight years now, and she has borrowed 16 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Helen would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens

loans.name: Ng'ombo

texts.en:
Ng'ombo is a very hard-working and enterprising man.  He says he has been able to greatly increase his income and help his family, thanks to his hard work.

He is asking for a loan of KES 50,000 to purchase more bales of clothes for his business. He is grateful for the new support he has received.

loans.use: to purchase more bales of clothes for his business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old single man from Rafah city. He lives with his family in a small simple house in the city. 

Mohammad works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income; this is the only source of income to the family. Mohammad would like to improve the family living conditions and buy all the needed stuff. 

Mohammad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN to help him to buy a water purification machine for his home. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to provide pure water for his family, since the water in his area is not clean. 

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for his home

loans.name: Abighl Greissy

texts.es: Abighl tiene 21 años, es soltera, labora en una institución de su ciudad del cual le queda un dinero extra para invertir en su negocio de venta de ropa. El crédito lo utilizará para comprar mercadería (pantalones, polos, blusas, etc.) para incrementar sus ingresos ya que su sueño es comprarse una casa.
texts.en: Abighl is 21 years old, single, and works for a city agency and she has money left over to invest in her clothing sales business.  She will use the money from this loan to buy merchandise (pants, polo shirts, blouses, etc.) so she can increase her income.  Her dream is to buy a house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: Maria de 56 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida, ella posee una pequeña tienda en su lugar de habitación, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, doña maría quiere mejorar su vivienda y construir una galera para poder poner su tienda, asi pueda vivir junto con su compañero de vida mas cómodos, por esa razón solicita un préstamo para poder comprar todos los materiales necesarios como:  cuartones de madera, laminas, clavos, pintura, etc. y asi construir la galera que tanto a soñado y tener en un mejor lugar su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria, 56, lives with her common-law husband.  She runs a small store at home and earns enough from sales to cover some of the household expenses.  Maria wants to carry out home improvements and build a shed for the store so she and her husband can live more comfortably.

The loan will be used to buy materials such as boards, metal sheeting, nails, paint, etc. to build the shed she has been dreaming of in an aim to improve her business.

loans.use: To buy materials such as boards, metal sheeting, nails, paint, etc.

loans.name: Janie

texts.en:
Janie is 32 years old and an entrepreneur who has run a kiosk business for years. She established her business using her own capital. 

She started the kiosk by selling soap, detergent, toothpaste, and snacks. Nowadays her kiosk has been growing better, which made her able to add more stuff to her kiosk, such as rice, shampoo, biscuits, soft drinks,  etc. The profit of her kiosk enables her to sell mobile-phone credit. 

In order to fulfill the demand of her customers, she was thinking of adding more stock for Christmas sale, such as soft drinks and some cake ingredients. She has submitted an individual loan aplication to TLM and requested an amount of IDR 4,500,000.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for Christmas sale, such as soft drinks and some cake ingredients

loans.name: Jarvie

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Jarvie works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and motorcycle transport. Jarvie is borrowing 29,500 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Jarvie has been sustaining her business activities with the help of two previous loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Emilda

texts.en:
Emilda works hard to support her family; she is married, and has a fishing business in the Philippines. Emilda has been in this business for 20 years now.

Emilda requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fishing net and other supplies for her fishing business.

In the future, Emilda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net and other supplies for her fishing business

loans.name: Jorry

texts.en:
Jorry works hard to support his family. Jorry is married, and has had a furniture making business in the Philippines for seven years.

Jorry requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to purchase materials like wood, lumber, nails, etc. for his furniture making.

In the future, Jorry would like to save enough to provide a secure future for his family.

loans.use: to purchase materials like wood, lumber, nails, etc. for his furniture making business

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una joven de 26 años que vive en Quillacollo, provincia ubicada a 16 km. del centro de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Ella es Ingeniera Química y trabaja en la Alcaldía de Quillacollo.  Proviene de una familia de siete hermanos, su papá es minero jubilado y su mamá es ama de casa. Su pasión por su carrera nació desde muy pequeña, desde que una profesora le dijo que el agua es vida y que el agua esta hecha de química. 
Ella es soltera por lo que vive con sus padres, apoyando con los gastos económicos de la casa. Por esta razón solicita un crédito educativo para un Diplomado en Gestión Medio Ambiental, para poder crecer profesionalmente perfeccionando sus conocimientos y tener un mejor ingreso económico.
Julia agradece la oportunidad que se le está brindando para continuar sus estudios superiores.
texts.en:
Julia is 26 years old and lives in the Quillacollo province, 16 km from the centre of the city of Cochabamba.  Julia is a chemical engineer and works for the Quillacollo town hall.  Julia comes from a family a seven children; her father is a retired miner and her mother is a housewife.  Julia has had a passion for her work since she was very young - it all started when one teacher told her that water is life, and that water is made from chemicals.

Julia is single and so lives with her parents, supporting them with household costs.  For this reason, Julia is applying for a loan in order to pay for a diploma in environmental management.  This will allow her to grow as a professional and to develop her knowledge and earn a greater income.  Julia is grateful for this opportunity to continue with her further education.

loans.use: to pay for her diploma in environmental management.

loans.name: Isidoro

texts.es:
Isidoro, soltero de 23 años, nacido en la provincia Andres Ibáñez del departamento de Santa Cruz – Bolivia desea cursar una Maestría en Sistemas Integrados de Gestión de Seguridad, Medio Ambiente y Calidad de la Universidad Autónoma Gabriel Rene Moreno, motivo por el cual requiere un Crédito de EDUCA-PRÓ para financiar sus Estudios.

Isidoro trabaja como encargado del Laboratorio de Química  de la misma universidad donde estudio. Vive con sus padres y hermanos, no tiene otros ingresos económicos y ocasionalmente tiene otras actividades como dar ayudantías a alumnos de la misma carrera que necesitan nivelación en sus estudios y realizar algún curso complementario a su carrera. La principal motivación que tiene en la vida, es la superación personal y poder cumplir sus sueños.
